text:
- Hi everybody, My name's
Paolo Domenighetti,
I am the CEO and co-founder of Goodcode.

Goodcode provides solution
in the field of cryptography,

machine learning, computer
vision, and data mining too.

Our company has been founded
upon the solutions AWS.

AWS helped our company in
providing like a Lego box

for us to build our solution,
taking elemental pieces
and focus on verticality of our projects.
AWS coming in the Swiss region

in Zurich is very important
for us and our customers.
For us because we can ensure that storage
on Swiss grounds and for our customer,
I'm thinking in the financial service,

it's very important to
have data stored here,

and all the solution
running on Swiss territory.
For us, AWS makes us grow without assets,
and we can expand without bounds.
